name: Ricky's Rad Adventures
description:
Join Ricky as he attempts to get the dogs out of his home! However, the dogs are actually robots and are being made by someone! Find out who!

This is a short little platformer I made for the FBLA-PBL competition in which it got 1st in the state of Georgia for.

CREDITS:

GameMaker: Studio Professional

incompetech.com/newgrounds.com - Music/Sounds

gameart2d.com - Sprites

I am technically finished with the game, but story delivery needs work. The game should play perfectly though. There isn't any saving or scoreboards.
